getting_started_text: Connect your wallet to start opening Vaults
create_account_text: Your wallet is connected! Now let's create a Proxy Contract so you can start to deposit, borrow and earn rewards.
create_vault_text: Your account was created! The final step is to create a Vault, deposit a collateral and borrow some {{coin_ticker}}.
confirm_details_text: Please review and click on the Confirm Transaction button to submit and sign the transaction in your wallet.
wrong_network: Heads up, you're on the wrong network! Please switch to
connect_text: Connect an Ethereum wallet to manage your {{coin_ticker}} positions
error_try_refresh: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
confirmations_info: You need to wait for 10 block confirmations to make sure that your account address does not change.
annual_redemption_tip: Rate at which HAI is devalued or revalued over 1 year.
liquidation_price_tip: Collateral price under which this Vault can get liquidated. The liquidation price varies with the dollar value of debt owed.
liquidation_penalty_tip: Liquidations ask for more HAI than you have minted in your Vault, and apply a discount on the latest oracle price in order to incentivize bidding.
fullyUnlocked: You can claim all your KITE rewards right after you earn them.
proxy_wallet_text: Your wallet is connected! Now, let's create your Proxy Contract
shutdown_text: The global settlement procedure was triggered for this system. You can't manage your Vaults from this application anymore.
redemption_price_tip: The 'moving peg' that the HAI market price should return to
collateral_ratio_tip: The ratio between the value of the collateral and the value of debt in your Vault
debt_auction_minting_flx_desc: Debt auctions are meant to mint and auction new KITE in exchange for HAI. The HAI that is received by an auction will be used to eliminate bad (or otherwise called uncovered) debt from the system.
debt_auction_how_to_bid_desc: During a debt auction, you will bid a fixed amount of HAI for a decreasing amount of KITE. A practical example: if the current KITE bid is 100 for 20K HAI (resulting in a price of 200 HAI/KITE), the next bid must accept less KITE for the same amount of HAI. The auction also makes sure that each bid must be at least a certain percentage smaller than the previous one (e.g the next bid must be at least 3% smaller).
debt_auction_claim_tokens: What does the Claim Tokens button do?
debt_auction_claim_tokens_desc: In case someone outbids you in a debt auction, your HAI bid will be reimbursed to your Proxy Contract.Claim Tokens can be used to get back HAI (and KITE) that is kept in your Account.
collateral_auction_increasing_discount_d: In order to incentivize bidding, collaterals are sold at a discount in comparison with the market price. The discount increases with time, until the discount deadline timestamp, where discount will have arrived to a maximum value.
collateral_auction_settlement_desc: Collateral auctions don't have a deadline, they will remain open until either all collateral was sold, or all required HAI was raised, in which case the auction will be closed and the remaining collateral will be returned to the Vault owner.
collateral_auction_minting_flx_desc: Collateral auctions are meant to sell collateral that was seized from a Vault in exchange for HAI. The HAI that is received by an auction will be burned.
surplus_auction_minting_flx_desc: Surplus auctions are meant to sell HAI that has accrued inside the protocol in exchange for KITE. The KITE that is received by an auction will be burned.
surplus_auction_how_to_bid_desc: During a surplus auction, you will bid an increasing amount of KITE for a fixed amount of HAI. A practical example: if the current KITE bid is 100 for 20K HAI (resulting in a price of 200 HAI/KITE), the next bidder must bid more KITE for the same amount of HAI. The auction also makes sure that each bid must be at least a certain percentage higher than the previous one (e.g the next bid must be at least 3% higher).
surplus_auction_claim_tokens: What does the Claim Tokens button do?
surplus_auction_claim_tokens_desc: In case someone outbids you in a surplus auction, your KITE bid will be reimbursed to your Proxy Contract. Claim Tokens can be used to get back KITE (and HAI) that is kept in your Account.
managed_vault_warning: CAUTION: You are not the owner of this Vault. You can only deposit collateral or repay debt. Note that these operations are irreversible.
liquidate_vault_warning: CAUTION: You are about to start the liquidation of this Vault. Note that this operation is irreversible.
liquidate_confirmation: I understand that I am about to liquidate this Vault.
eth_next_osm_tip: Next collateral price that will be used by the system. This price is updated once per hour
eth_osm_tip: Current collateral price used by the system. This price is delayed 1h from the live collateral price feed and it's only updated once per hour
stability_fee_tip: Annual interest rate paid by Vault owners on their debt. Proceeds from the borrow rate go to the protocol's balance sheet.
hai_red_price_tip: HAI's “moving peg”. It's the price at which HAI is minted or repaid inside the protocol. The HAI market price is expected to fluctuate around the redemption price.
moneygod_desc: The Money God League is an initiative to help other teams launch their own HAI like assets and share a stake in each of their protocols with the Reflexer community. You can stake KITE or KITE/ETH Uniswap v2 LP tokens and receive (un)governance tokens in League participants.
